name: Remove Exported Mailbox from Exchange Webserver
description: Detects removal of an exported Exchange mailbox which could be to cover tracks from ProxyShell exploit
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:MSExchange\ Management AND Remove\-MailboxExportRequest AND \ \-Identity\  AND \ \-Confirm\ \"False\")`
